sqlMap.statement:
SELECT T19.CODEGROUP AS "CDGROUP" , T19.DESCRIPTION AS "CDGROUPDESC" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM20 WHERE CODEGROUP = T19.CODEGROUP ) AS CHILDCNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM19 T19 LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAICM20 T20 ON T19.CODEGROUP = T20.CODEGROUP
( UPPER(T19.CODEGROUP) LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchName#||'%') OR UPPER(T20.CODE) LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchName#||'%') OR UPPER(T20.CODENAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#searchName#||'%') )
GROUP BY T19.CODEGROUP , T19.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY T19.CODEGROUP

SELECT level AS "level" , T20.CODE AS "id" , T20.PARENTCODE AS "parent" , 'true' AS "expanded" , isLeaf AS "isLeaf" , T20.CODE AS "CODE" , T20.CODENAME AS "CODENAME" , T20.PARENTCODE AS "PARENTCODE" , T20.CODEGROUP AS "CODEGROUP" , CASE WHEN T20.SEQ = 0 THEN '' ELSE CAST(T20.SEQ as CHAR) END AS "SEQ" , CASE WHEN T20.USEYN IS NULL OR T20.USEYN = '' THEN 'N' ELSE T20.USEYN END AS "USEYN" , CASE WHEN T20.PARENTCODE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE T20.USEYN END AS "USEYNNAME" FROM ( SELECT 1 AS level , 'true' AS isLeaf , CODEGROUP , CODE , CODENAME , CASE WHEN PARENTCODE IS NULL THEN #searchCodeGroup# ELSE PARENTCODE END PARENTCODE , SEQ , USEYN FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM20 WHERE CODEGROUP = #searchCodeGroup# UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS level , 'false' AS isLeaf , CODEGROUP , CODEGROUP AS CODE , '' , NULL , 0 , '' FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM19 WHERE CODEGROUP = #searchCodeGroup# ) AS T20 ORDER BY T20.SEQ, T20.CODE
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAICM20( CODEGROUP , CODE , CODENAME , SEQ , PARENTCODE , USEYN ) VALUES ( #codeGroup# , #code# , #codeName# , CAST(#seq# AS INTEGER) , #parentCode# , #useYn# )
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAICM20 SET CODENAME = #codeName# , SEQ = CAST(#seq# AS INTEGER) , USEYN = #useYn# WHERE CODEGROUP = #codeGroup# AND CODE = #code#

DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM20 x WHERE CODEGROUP = #codeGroup#
AND CODE = #code#
